title: What games have beaten you?
body:
Games that are just too hard/frustrating that you give up playing. 

For me, it was Doom 2 with Brutal Doom and Project Brutality mods. Was playing on the highest difficulty, which meant that you fought super powered monsters that you're not supposed to meet until the last three levels on the first few levels. Got to level 18 and gave up after getting one shot by super powered pain elementals. 

http://i.imgur.com/7di04KK.jpg
